contracts.title: Griffin Slayer
contracts.description: A griffin has been terrorizing the farmlands, attacking livestock and peasants. The witcher must track, kill, and present the trophy to claim payment.

company.name: Alderman Harviken
company.description: The village elder of White Orchard, sworn to protect the people from beast attacks. Fair payer and respectful of witchers' code.

contracts.title: Noonwraith Banisher
contracts.description: A noonwraith haunts the abandoned mill, appearing daily at high noon. The witcher must banish the spirit using proper oils, signs, and rituals.

company.name: Velen Peasants' Council
company.description: A group of farmers and millers pooling coin to hire a professional monster slayer.

contracts.title: Drowner Nest Purger
contracts.description: Drowners infest the docks, dragging dockhands into the water and damaging shipments. Destroy the nest and cleanse the area.

company.name: Novigrad Merchants’ Guild
company.description: A powerful guild of traders and shippers determined to keep their profits safe from monsters.

contracts.title: Werewolf Hunter
contracts.description: A cursed man stalks the forests, killing livestock and frightening clansfolk. The Jarl demands his head before the next full moon.

company.name: Jarl Thormar
company.description: Leader of a small Skellige clan. Fierce protector of his people and patron of witcher contracts.

contracts.title: Leshen Eliminator
contracts.description: Hunters have gone missing, their remains found tangled in roots. A leshen has claimed the territory and must be destroyed.

company.name: Velen Huntsmen's Lodge
company.description: A brotherhood of trappers and gamekeepers sworn to protect the wilds from dark forces.

contracts.title: Foglet Exterminator
contracts.description: A murderous foglet preys on ferrymen along the Pontar. Kill the beast and bring proof to claim the bounty.

company.name: Oxenfurt Riverboat Association
company.description: A collective of ferrymen and dock owners relying on safe river travel.
